[h1] вам батя в Белую Рощу [/h1]

Но путь этот будет неблизкий и полный экшена в стиле Call of Duty: Modern Warfare.   игра не дает расслабится все прохождение.  даже фирменных задачек - минимум.  Основной квест: Добратся до белой рощи.  но путь будет проходить через шахты, леса, пушку с Антиматерией,  Зомбаков,  Вертики, и Одного Советника.  игра  Делает сильный упор в Экшен.  и Открытая концовка.

入这个游戏 主要是因为     他打折了。。才3块

游戏画面比较老了 很多地方没提示比如要搬东西 压电梯 打坏风扇 还有各种小机关

All I have to say is that the game ends on a cliffhanger and it's already been 10 years without a sequel. Do you really think Valve's gonna release one in the future?

Заключительный эпизод про Гордона Фримена,а так всё хорошо начиналось и уже конец.
Перестрелки с комбайнами,первая встреча с охотниками(те ещё засранцы),сново доступен транспорт(переделанный Багги),Белая Роща и её сопротивление,эпичная защита Белой Рощи от Страйдеров,встреча и битва с двумя стражами,пёсик-нас замечательный и преданный друг Аликс,прохождение сквозь жуткие шахты,вертигоны,ужас,веселье,страх,головоломки.Не возможно не любить эту игру.Также на сцене появляются советники Альянса которые умеют упралять телекинезом(против них ты беспомощен).
И конечно же Финал(эпично обрывающийся на полуслове).Что дальше скажите вы,а я скажу вам!Дальше ничего,пустота, 10 лет ожидания,надежда рушится на глазах,разочарование,где же продолжение,где оноооооо?Где развязка сюжета,гдееее?Гейййййбббб,продолжение хочу!
Но всё таки в душе осталась искорка,маленькая,слабогорящая и она верит,что Сиквел состоится).

I'm just writing this review to ask people to stop giving it negative reviews with messages about how they're disapointed about what happened to the Half-Life franchise. If you don't like the game than give it a negative review, if you don't like how Valve just pretty much fucked up what could have possibly been one of the top greatest video game franchises ever than write a blog about it online or somewhere else that isn't in the form of hurting this games ratings on Steam. New people will see the negative reviews and assume it's a bad game and decide not to buy it which will than in turn hurt the franchise even more. So to the people who post negative reviews but talk about how Valve fucked up your favourite franchise you're essentially making the situation worse, to give an analogy you're pouring gasoline on a fire with the intent to put it out and you need to stop.

And now I join my brothers in my post, after all these years, my watch beginns

"Night gathers, and now my watch begins. It shall not end until the offical release. I shall take no wife, hold no lands, father no children. I shall wear no crowns and win no glory. I shall live and die at my post. I am the sword in the darkness. I am the watcher on the walls. I am the shield that guards the realms of men. I pledge my life and honor to the Half Life Watch, for this night and all the nights to come."

The game is more of HL2 and HL2 EP1, the story is only better than EP1 and there are some minor improvements.

Good game if you get in a bundle or on sale, otherwise kinda expensive.

As most have pointed out, there was suppossed to be a countinuation of the story, but it never happened. Shame, but there are still plenty of other good games out there. The game mechanics are pretty good in the HL games, so they are worth a playthrough, but dont get overly attached to the story or characters, as you will be feeling dissapointed.

6.5/10

Half-Life 2: Episode Two - третья часть, из серии фантастического боевика "Half-Life 2". В принципе, изменений в игре не увидел, даже из оружия все стандартно, что и было, кроме феромонов для муравьёв и гравипушки "версии 2.0". Познакомился с новыми врагами - охотник и советник. 
Игру можно разделить на две части - спасение Алекс и миссия по закрытию портала. Прохождение удивило простатой, в руководство слазил, только один раз, поэтому может, мне показалось, игра стала короче, чем предыдущий эпизод.
I want half life 3, Valve, Please?

The vastness of the Combine’s power, the futility of our struggle, blossomed briefly in my awareness. I saw everything.

Enough time has passed that few remember me, or what I was saying when last I spoke, or what precisely we hoped to accomplish. At this point, the resistance will have failed or succeeded, no thanks to me. Old friends have been silenced, or fallen by the wayside. I no longer know or recognize most members of the research team, though I believe the spirit of rebellion still persists. I expect you know better than I the appropriate course of action, and I leave you to it. Expect no further correspondence from me regarding these matters; this is my final episode.

Para mi gusto mejor que el episodio 1, dura algo mas pero la cuestión es que no se hace monótono, almenos a mí. Mas variedad de enemigos y de entornos. Esta vez tienes un pedazo de buga con tu chati y no se me ha hecho cansino conducir. El nuevo personaje científico es la leche. Queremos maaaaaaaaaaaas half liiiiiiiiiiiiiiifeeeeeeeee por eso teneis mi voto positivo. ANALIZADO  EN OCTUBRE DE 2017.

Great prequel to Half Life 3. Makes a lot more sense how Half Life 3 started.

I was a bit nervous going into this game after Episode 1, because I wasn't sure if it'd be able to come up with enough new mechanics and narrative elements to keep the series fresh. I was very pleasantly surprised in that HL2E2 matches its predecessor pretty much evenly. There was no shortage of thrilling moments or mildly challenging puzzles and the pacing of all of the chapters is excellent. 

It's a travesty that this is where the story seems to have ended because there seems to be a huge potential for crossover with Aperture and exploration of the world left at the end of HL2E2. I guess I'll just cross my fingers and keep waiting!
Half-Life 2 gameplay, but with as much variety as the original game. Picks up after Episode One in a timely manner. Arguably better than the first game.
Half-Life <3

Half-Life 2: Episode Two понравился мне больше, чем предыдущие эпизоды.
 (не касается определений ниже)
1) Геймплей настолько хорош, что можно даже достижения весело выполнять
2) Сюжету здесь могут позавидовать многие современные игры
3) Большинство достижений сложные , но чем сложнее достижения, тем интереснее их проходить
4) Атмосфера, как и в Half-Life 2 на высоте
5) Музыкальное сопровождение с атмосферой отлично сочитаются, в битвах тоже
Дополнительно : 
1) Особенно мне понравилось достижение ''Маленький космонавт'', оно придаёт игре особый интерес.
2) Финал здесь очень неожиданный и запоминающийся надолго

Well... I just finished the trilogy, and it deserves an upvote, I don't agree with review bombing. Such masterpiece must be upvoted. 

This game is great, well-written, a masterpiece. This upvote goes for the team who created the HL 2 series. I didn't want to touch this last epìsode because I knew that I'll face a void. Maybe Valve is waiting for their new engine, just like the jump they did from HL to HL2, but the last news are depressing. Maybe we will never see Ep. 3, maybe we will. 
A bitter ending, this comunity hungers for more, but not for quantity, hungers for quality. Not even actual AAA titles are rich as this game. The story is prefectly written, it's like you live the tale, you laugh, your blood boils, and the feels throw never ending punches.

Afiter such cliffhanger, and Valve mediocricy with their games such as TF2 (I used to play it but now their official stuff is pretty dead), CS GO (I play it but *HAX INTENSIFIES*), I don't expect the same level as quality as they did with the HL franchise, they could add crates or any other bs (in such incident, yes review bombing is the solution, that'd be a disgusting move from Valve), or even the launch of a new HL episode. Valve is not looking for quality, they are looking for skins, hats, cosmetics, etc... I truly lost my faith in Valve.

But still, I'd recommend this game, and not only the game but the entire damn series. I know Valve is acting like a douche, but this game deservers praise! I'll remember this game forever and I will keep it as an example of true quality.

Good game. Commentary is also fascinating. Loved hearing about how the various elements were lovingly built to create a coherent and innovative experience. So easy to take for granted how much Valve put into this game.  
Love: 
- the characters
- the drama and sense of urgency
- the humour
- the great core gameplay

Minor niggles:
- gameplay is beginning to feel tired. By the time I reached the latter part of the game I was thinking "I've seen this all before" (that judgment might be partially to do with the fact I played HL2, HL2: EP1 and HL2: EP2 back-to-back) 
- Not a fan of the driving bits, which feel clumsy to me (or revealed my clumsiness, take your pick)

What would I like from HL2: EP3?

1. More of the great story, characters, humour
2. Some new and interesting mechanic to help enliven the gameplay
3. The original voice acting cast and writers to return
4. A conclusion fitting of it's predecessors

Valve, if you want ideas on where to go with HL2: EP3, I'd love to contribute. 

HL2: EP2 is a classic and I love it. And like so many others, I want more. Fingers crossed.

Yet another great continuation on the Half-Life series. Only bad thing about this one is the cliffhanger ending and the fact that there isn't anymore Half-Life story out there.

Episode Two est une très bonne extension faisant suite à Episode One. Il est meilleur que la précédente extension, ce qui constitue évidemment une caractéristique qui est la bienvenue. Comme d'habitude, bons graphismes, bon gameplay, bonne histoire... Bref on retrouve là tous les atouts de Half-Life 2. La fin est également pas mal et donne envie de savoir ce qui se passera, mais c'est un peu dommage qu'elle soit si ouverte et qu'on n'ait toujours pas de suite.

Tren patlamasının ardından etrafa saçılan kıvılcımlar oyunda ilk gözümüze çarpan yenilik olacaktır veyahut çoktan olmuştur eğer oyunu oynadıysanız bu ek pakette. Orange Box adıyla HL2 episode 2, Team Fortress 2 ve Portal oyunlarını barındırıyordu çıktığı Ekim 2007 tarihinde. Diğer oyunlar satış amaçlı, öylesine hediye edilmiş basit yapımlardı diye düşünülmesin, Team Fortress 2 günümüzde, Overwatch, Paladins, Battleborne ve yakın zamanda çıkacak türevlerinin atasıdır. Hâlâ ondaki görevler, dinamikler kullanılıyor ve seviliyor yeni oyunlarda. Portal ise benzerine rastlanmayan fakat çıkışının ardından yine pek çok oyuna fikir babalığı yapan bambaşka bir yapımdır. Böyle dolu dolu gelmişti paket. Oyunun devamına dönersek kaza sonrasında yaşananlarla başlıyor. Yıkıntılar arasından yolumuzu bulmaya çalışırken bir yandan da sinyalimizi gönderme derdindeyiz. İlk bölümlerde tabiata dönüş yaşanıyor da denilebilir. Ardından Alyx’in ağır yara aldığı bir sahne yaşıyoruz ve ana oyunda bizi kurtaran yaratıklar yine yardımımıza koşuyor. Bu sefer onlarla giderek Alyx’in kurtuluşu için öz bulmaya çabalarken bu kez farklı bölümlere giriyor ve yeraltına, böcek yuvalarının arasına iniyoruz. Yeni rakiplerimiz var artık, sarı fosforlu böcekler, gücümüzü azaltıyorlar ve bitirebiliyorlar. Canımız bitmezse yani ölmezsek yeniden dolmaya başlıyor. Yavrularının bulunduğu kozalak benzeri yuvalardan can toplayabilme mekaniği eklenmiş.

Aradığımız özü bularak ve sonrasında akın akın gelen kumböceklerine karşı giriştiğimiz zorlu bir savunma savaşının ardından iyileştirebildiğimiz ve sürekli bize yani Gordon’a hayranlığı artan Alyx ile yolumuza devam ediyoruz. Tek başımıza bir araç bularak birkaç fiziksel bulmacayı daha çözmemiz gerekiyor. Aracı bulduktan sonra yoldaki noktalarla uzatılan bölümler eşliğinde üsse ulaşıyor ve bilgileri veriyoruz. Yaşanan baskın ve sonrasındaki hayli zor son savaşın ardından oyunumuz acıklı ve şaşırtıcı sahneyle sonlanıyor. Eksilerinden bahsettiğim ana karaktere verilen ayakçılık görevlerinin benzeri burada yaşanıyor. Füzeyi imal eden kişi Alyx’in babasıyla konuştuğumuz esnada bir şey söyleyeceğim tarzında yanına çağırıyor ve ateşin ortasına atıyor. Oyundaki sırlar da burada biraz daha gösteriyor kendisini. Zira öldüğümüzde sanki düşman bizmişiz gibi adam haklı çıktı gibi yazıları çıkıyor. Ayrıca uzun bacaklıları yeneceğimiz silah da oyuna son anda eklenen bir başka dinamik olarak artı denebilir.  Nihayetinde füze atılıyor, geçit kapanıyor ama beklemediğimiz bir olayla müstakbel kayınpederimizi kaybediyoruz ve oyun burada sona ererken Episode 3’ü beklemeye başlıyoruz…
Таскал всю игру гнома, и забыл положить его в ракету)
